name: Qiu Tung
story: Zhong Sun was born and raised in China. After completing his mandatory military service, he joined the People's Liberation Army and specialized in reconnaissance. He quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills, earning him the rank of Sergeant. Zhong Sun is married with children and is a devoted Buddhist, finding inner peace through meditation. He is known for his calm and collected demeanor, always making rational decisions in the field.
